resources.string:
multiple transseptal cath
 induction or attempted induction of arrhythmia
 R and L atrial pacing where possible
 R and L atrial recording where possibl
 RV pacing and recording
 His bundle recording
 pulmonary vein isolation

EP Coding is designed to help cardiac electrophysiologists in coding electrophysiology procedures. These are just guidelines and are not intended to be used by professional coders. If you have suggestions or comments, please contact us. 

Email: mannd@epstudiossoftware.com 
Web: www.epstudiossoftware.com 
Source: github.com/mannd/epcoding
